segments.text: Hey Mike . What are you doing ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Nothing much . What are you up to ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I was just concerned about Sam . He hasn't been himself lately .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: He took the civil service exam and failed .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That sucks . He must feel depressed .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah . He's been sitting in his room everyday for the last 4 days .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Why don't we take him out ? We can try to take his mind off of it . In the least show him that we're there for him .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's a great idea . Why don't you call him . I already talked to him a couple of times and it might be good for him to hear from somebody else .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Ok . I'll call you back after I'm done .
segments.speaker: S1
